strategy.trend_analysis: The strategy incorporates current trends like meme culture, political satire, and the enduring popularity of Marvel and superhero content. It leverages specific quotes and character references to capture niche interest while using broader hashtags for wider discoverability. Engagement-focused tags encourage interaction.
strategy.engagement_strategy: Engagement is driven by using call-to-action hashtags like #WhatDoYouThink and #TagAFriend, alongside hashtags that highlight humorous and thought-provoking content like #MemeCulture and #PoliticalHumor, which naturally encourage users to share and discuss.

usage_tips: For Instagram, mix a variety of hashtag sizes (primary, trending, niche, broad) to maximize discoverability. Aim for 15-30 relevant hashtags per post.
Place hashtags in the caption or the first comment, depending on your aesthetic preference.
Monitor the performance of different hashtags to see which ones drive the most engagement and adjust your strategy accordingly.
Consider creating a unique hashtag for your own content series if you plan to post similar content regularly.

generation_metadata.topic: Marvel Comics shortest: ANT-MAN PANEL! Bennett shrinks in! 'Size doesn't MATTER!' Betrayal panel: RIGHT-WING SHOCK! Loki-style side switch! Coalition panel: ENEMIES TOGETHER! Hate lines between all! Yamina DISSOLVES: Spider-Man dusting effect! PARTICLES! COVID surf panels: Silver Surfer on variant waves! SWOOSH! Putin meeting: BABY CHAIR! Instant meme panel! 'HUMILIATION!' Iran panels: Watching bad futures helplessly. Strange-style despair! One year COLLAPSE: 'At least I WAS PM!' Tech world vanish panel! POOF! Post-credit: Bibi's evil laugh! 'TOLD YOU SO!' HA HA HA!
